content: welcome to krissy s over the mountain crochet this baby doll outfit is adorable so quick to crochet the shell design is a match to the shell moses basket 1 doll easily found at dollar tree 2 crochet pattern is easy to intermediate 3 4 cotton yarn that is on the light side is recommended 4 very fast to crochet 5 pattern includes both the dress and hat your little ones will love this shell dress and hat on this adorable doll your little ones would be so happy to recieve this set as a gift this design is part of the mini christmas in july pattern bundle this bundle will help you with christmas gift giving mini christmas in july bundle 1 copyright statement this pattern is protected by copyright©krissysoverthemountaincrochet 2022 do not distribute alter or share this pattern in any shape or form you have my permission to sell the product you make using my pattern no mass production is allowed 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/sources/mini-christmas-in-july-2022
